name: @primodiumxyz/dex-graphql
description: GraphQL client for TypeScript with Hasura & Timescale support, for indexing Solana DEX trades and tokens.

scripts.prepare: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c '[ "$NODE_ENV" = production ] && exit 0; pnpm hasura update-cli --version v2.44.0-beta.1'
scripts.local:seed: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura seed apply --all-databases'
scripts.remote:apply-migrations: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura migrate apply --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:apply-metadata: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura metadata apply --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:metadata-ic: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura metadata ic list --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:metadata-reload: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura metadata reload --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:migrate-init: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura migrate create init --from-server --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:migrate-reset: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura migrate delete --all --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:migrate-status: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura migrate status --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
scripts.remote:upgrade-v3: dotenvx run -f ./../../.env --quiet -- sh -c 'pnpm hasura scripts update-project-v3 --endpoint "$HASURA_URL" --admin-secret "$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET"'
